title: The Parable of the Tenants and Warnings
summary: Jesus tells the Parable of the Tenants, confronting religious leaders. He answers questions about taxes, resurrection, and the greatest commandment. He warns against hypocritical teachers and praises a poor widowâ€™s generous offering.

faq.question: What is a key message in Mark 12?
faq.answer: It emphasizes the servant nature of Jesus and the power of faith in action.

faq.question: What does Mark 12 reveal about Jesus?
faq.answer: It shows His authority, compassion, and call to follow Him wholeheartedly.
